saito_available_1.en: SAITO is now available for purchase:
saito_available_1.zh: SAITO现在已向公众开放。 点击

saito_long_desc.en: Saito is a Web3 Foundation grant recipient that pays nodes in the P2P network instead of miners or stakers, delivering a permissionless and scalable network capable of powering decentralized versions of Twitter, Facebook and Amazon without the need for predatory monopolies in the network layer.
saito_long_desc.zh: Saito可在无封闭插件和非开放底层架构的浏览器中运行区块链应用，甚至可以给付节点以保证其他网络可以在自由及去中心化的环境下运行。

powerful_applications.zh: 真正的点对点 Web 3.0工具包

powerful_applications_desc.en: Saito powers games, communication tools, social media apps and other data and bandwidth-intensive applications
powerful_applications_desc.zh: 基于ZKP的点对点博彩/经济功能，如发牌、盲拍、随机数生成等

polkadot_ecosystem_desc.en: Saito applications come with full support for Polkadot and other leading Web3 blockchains
polkadot_ecosystem_desc.zh: 支持波卡以及其它Web3版本

proper_economics_desc.en: An elegant economic design that solves fundamental scaling problems
proper_economics_desc.zh: 支持游戏、社交媒体等数据密集型应用，并可根据实际需要获得足够共识

open_infra_desc.en: Saito funds the rollout of infrastructure for other networks as well as its own
open_infra_desc.zh: 为开发人员提供包括移动端QR扫描等在内的一款简单易上手的DApp平台

peer2peer_desc.en: Libraries that support everything from QR-generation and scanning to ZKP-based gaming functions
peer2peer_desc.zh: Saito去中心化第三方可信的区块链技术，可高效处理数据加密及认证

app_deployment_desc.en: Open AppStore that lets developers build and deploy apps without the need to run any infrastructure
app_deployment_desc.zh: Saito的底层架构可保证其它区块链技术以去中心化的方式在Saito上顺利运行

enterprise_pki_support_desc.en: A scalable PKI network layer designed to handle enterprise-level key-exchange and encryption requirements
enterprise_pki_support_desc.zh: 通过点对点方式在链上分配DApp（有POC演示）

vibrant_community_desc.en: A growing community of users interested in and excited about the applications want to build...
vibrant_community_desc.zh: 通过简洁的经济原理设计出可扩展的吞吐规模

scalable_onchain.zh:
可扩展的
链上数据

browser_app_without_metamask.zh:
浏览器
应用无需使用
Metamask钱包

all_with_know_love.en:
All with the
tools you know
and love
all_with_know_love.zh:
无数你熟悉
和喜爱的工具

legals_structure_public_sale.en: Legals and Structure for Public Sale
legals_structure_public_sale.zh: 确立公售结构及合法性
